text: The Secret Garden is a 1993 fantasy drama movie. This movie is about the unloved child of an English couple during the 19th century. Kate Maberly plays the child. Maggie Smith plays Mrs. Medlock. This movie was released on August 13, 1993 in the United States. title: The Secret Garden (movie)
